scripts.install-next-electron: npm ci && cd electron && npm ci && cd ..
scripts.dev-electron: npm run build && npm run export && npx rimraf electron/app && npx cap copy electron && npx cap open electron
scripts.build-electron: npm run build && npm run export && npx rimraf electron/app && (cd electron && npx cap copy electron && npx electron-packager . --overwrite --icon ./assets/icon)
scripts.add-android: npm run build && npm run export && rm -rf ./android && npx cap add android
scripts.build-android: npm run build && npm run export && npx cap sync android
scripts.build-browser-extension-linux: npm run build && npm run export && cp -rf out/_next out/next && sed -i 's~_next~next~g' out/**.html && mv out/**.html extension && rsync -va --delete-after out/next/ extension/next/ && rm -rf out && rsync -va --delete-after public/next-assets extension/
scripts.build-browser-extension-mac: npm run build && npm run export && cp -rf out/_next out/next && sed -i '' -e 's~_next~next~g' out/**.html && mv out/**.html extension && rsync -va --delete-after out/next/ extension/next/ && rm -rf out && rsync -va --delete-after public/next-assets extension/
